album.title: One Love: The Very Best Of...

wiki.content:
*  Composed by: Bob Marley
     * Lyrics by: Bob Marley
     * Year: 1977
     * Length: 7:40
     * Musical key: A minor (live rarely also B minor)
     * Recorded at: Island's Basing Street Studios and the Fallout Shelter, London, England
     * Mixed at: Sterling Sound (USA) by Aston Barrett, Chris Blackwell and Karl Pitterson
     * Released on following albums: Exodus (1977), Babylon By Bus (live, 1978)
     * Released on following compilations: Legend (1984; Deluxe Edition 2002), Gold (2005)
     * Lineup:
           o Bob Marley, lead vocal, rhythm guitar
           o Aston Barrett, bass
           o Carlton Barrett, drums
           o Tyrone Downie, keyboards, harmony vocal
           o Alvin "Seeco" Patterson, percussion
           o Junior Marvin, lead guitar
           o The I-Threes, backing vocals
           o David Madden, trumpet
           o Glen DaCosta, alto sax
           o Vin Gordon, trombone 
     * Period of performances: 1977 - 1980 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: Exodus
comments: One of my favorites. Grande canção!
Certainly reminds me of getting stoned, though there are better things out there for me. Regardless of that notion, I enjoy Bob Marley songs. Therefor, that is all that matters.
Even metalheads can tell that is a masterpiece, especially to get stoned to...

love this song.  check out  "Dreams Of Freedom: Ambient Translations Of Bob Marley In Dub"  -http://www.last.fm/music/Bob+Marley/Dreams+of+Freedom%3A+Ambient+Translations+of+Bob+Marley+in+Dub  great album. i listen to it often.  highly recommended

YO POSITIVE PEOPLE!! If you like Bob Marley and Concious Reggae/Dancehall please check out my music. I am out of Cincinnati Ohio, concious lyrics and a message that must be heard. My last fm page is: http://www.last.fm/music/Elementree My myspace page is: http://www.myspace.com/elementree1. Jah Bless and his message forever spread!!
wow the rasta song..go go reaggea the best...
just rolled up in time,  great song  <3
el tema es excelente, y no todos los que les gusta bob tiene que ser marihuanero..
